text: Hannoa is a genus of plant in the family Simaroubaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Hannoa kitombetombe * Hannoa klaineana and Hannoa chlorantha. Both of these "are used in traditional medicine of Central African countries against fevers and malaria." ==References== Category:Sapindales genera Category:Plants used in traditional African medicine Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hannoa
